ygData.subject: Re: Bind Affinity Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Also the other thing to take into consideration when purchasing/using this spell is that if you send the eye out to look around you have to be prepared for
ygData.messageBody:
Also the other thing to take into consideration when purchasing/using this
spell is that if you send the eye out to look around you have to be
prepared for monsters to train to you. I have not personally experienced
that happening (because I use it very rarely if at all), but I have heard
of others who have used it in the dungeons only to pull a bunch of nasties
out on themselves, and everyone else, in the process. It is kind of a
novelty spell, if you ask me, with no real use at this point. If they made
the eye an entity that monsters would not train on it would be worthwhile,
otherwise I would just wait. Had I known I wouldn't have purchased it myself.




> > Also, can anyone tell me where I can find Eye of Zomm
> > in Qeynos? I
> > just want to increase my conjuration skill, which is at
> > "awful" level.
>
>I haven't purchased this spell, as it seems completely useless except
>for increasing Conjuration. My guess is that you will find it in the
>Guild of mages OR in the Temple of Life. If not there, take the boat
>to Erudin, it should be available in the Library or one of the
>spellcasters' towers.
>Aznyin
>Level 16 Erudite Wizard
>Chivalric Order of Norrath
>Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
>
>
